add(uint256,uint256).details: Returns sum if no overflow occurred

mul(uint256,uint256).details: Returns product if no overflow occurred

safeToAdd(uint256,uint256).details: Returns whether an add operation causes an overflow

safeToMul(uint256,uint256).details: Returns whether a multiply operation causes an overflow

safeToSub(uint256,uint256).details: Returns whether a subtraction operation causes an underflow

sub(uint256,uint256).details: Returns difference if no overflow occurred
